headline: Global Payments Reshapes Business With Worldpay Deal And Issuer Exit
summary: Global Payments completed its acquisition of Worldpay and divested its Issuer Solutions business. The company is repositioning as a pure-play commerce solutions provider with a global footprint. The combined business is focused on merchant acquiring and commerce technology across multiple regions. For investors watching NYSE:GPN, this is a major reshaping of the business at a time when the shares trade around $71.26. The stock has seen a 35.1% decline over the past year and a 62.7% decline...
